org.zaproxy.zap.view.popup

Class PopupMenuUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.view.popup.PopupMenuUtils

  • public final class PopupMenuUtils
extends Object
    A helper class with common utility methods for pop up menus (JPopupMenu) and its related classes (JMenus, JMenuItems, ExtensionPopupMenus, ExtensionPopupMenuItems).
    See Also:
    JPopupMenu, JMenu, ExtensionPopupMenu, ExtensionPopupMenuItem

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PopupMenuUtils.ComponentPopupMenuInvoker
      A PopupMenuInvokerWrapper for Components.
      static class  PopupMenuUtils.MessageContainerPopupMenuInvoker
      A PopupMenuInvokerWrapper for MessageContainers.
      static class  PopupMenuUtils.PopupMenuInvokerWrapper
      An abstract class that allows to check if a ExtensionPopupMenuComponent is enable for the contained wrapped object.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      static boolean insertSeparatorIfNeeded(JPopupMenu popupMenu, int position)
      Inserts a separator at the given position if it exists a non separator menu component at the given position and if there isn't, already, a separator immediately before the insert position (to prevent consecutive separators).

        public static boolean isAtLeastOneChildComponentVisible(Container component)
        Tells whether or not the given component has at least one child component visible.
        Parameters:
        component - the component that will be checked
        Returns:
        true if at least one child component is visible, false otherwise.

      • removeAllSeparators

        public static void removeAllSeparators(JPopupMenu popupMenu)
        Removes all separators from the given pop up menu.
        Parameters:
        popupMenu - the pop up menu whose separators will be removed
        See Also:
        JPopupMenu.Separator

      • removeAllSeparators

        public static void removeAllSeparators(JMenu menu)
        Convenience method that calls the method removeAllSeparators(JPopupMenu) with the JPopupMenu of the given menu as parameter.
        Parameters:
        menu - the menu whose separators will be removed
        See Also:
        removeAllSeparators(JPopupMenu), JMenu.getPopupMenu(), JPopupMenu.Separator

      • removeConsecutiveSeparators

        public static void removeConsecutiveSeparators(JPopupMenu popupMenu)
        Removes all consecutive separators from the given menu.

        For example, calling the method on the given menu: 

            Menu Entry
    Separator
    Menu Entry
    Separator
    Separator
    Menu Entry
        would result in: 
            Menu Entry
    Separator
    Menu Entry
    Separator
    Menu Entry

        Parameters:
        popupMenu - the pop up menu whose consecutive separators will be removed
        See Also:
        JPopupMenu.Separator

      • removeConsecutiveSeparators

        public static void removeConsecutiveSeparators(JMenu menu)
        Convenience method that calls the method removeConsecutiveSeparators(JPopupMenu) with the JPopupMenu of the given menu as parameter.
        Parameters:
        menu - the menu whose consecutive separators will be removed
        See Also:
        removeConsecutiveSeparators(JPopupMenu), JMenu.getPopupMenu(), JPopupMenu.Separator

      • removeTopSeparators

        public static void removeTopSeparators(JPopupMenu popupMenu)
        Removes all top separators from the given pop up menu.

        For example, calling the method on the given menu: 

            Separator
    Separator
    Menu Entry
    Separator
    Menu Entry
    Separator
    Menu Entry
        would result in: 
            Menu Entry
    Separator
    Menu Entry
    Separator
    Menu Entry

        Parameters:
        popupMenu - the pop up menu whose top separators will be removed
        See Also:
        JPopupMenu.Separator

            Menu Entry
    Separator
    Menu Entry
    Separator
    Menu Entry
    Separator
    Separator
        would result in: 
            Menu Entry
    Separator
    Menu Entry
    Separator
    Menu Entry

      • addSeparatorIfNeeded

        public static boolean addSeparatorIfNeeded(JPopupMenu popupMenu)
        Appends a separator to the end of the menu if it exists at least one non separator menu component immediately before and if there isn't, already, a separator at the end of the menu.
        Parameters:
        popupMenu - the pop up menu that will be processed
        Returns:
        true if the separator was added, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        JPopupMenu.Separator

      • addSeparatorIfNeeded

        public static boolean addSeparatorIfNeeded(JMenu menu)
        Convenience method that calls the method addSeparatorIfNeeded(JPopupMenu) with the JPopupMenu of the given menu as parameter.
        Parameters:
        menu - the menu that will be processed
        Returns:
        true if the separator was added, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        addSeparatorIfNeeded(JPopupMenu), JMenu.getPopupMenu(), JPopupMenu.Separator

      • insertSeparatorIfNeeded

        public static boolean insertSeparatorIfNeeded(JPopupMenu popupMenu,
                              int position)
        Inserts a separator at the given position if it exists a non separator menu component at the given position and if there isn't, already, a separator immediately before the insert position (to prevent consecutive separators).
        Parameters:
        popupMenu - the pop up menu that will be processed
        position - the position where a separator might be inserted
        Returns:
        true if the separator was inserted, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        JPopupMenu.Separator

      • insertSeparatorIfNeeded

        public static boolean insertSeparatorIfNeeded(JMenu menu,
                              int position)
        Convenience method that calls the method insertSeparatorIfNeeded(JPopupMenu,int) with the JPopupMenu of the given menu as the first parameter and with the given position as second parameter.
        Parameters:
        menu - the menu that will be processed
        position - the position where a separator might be inserted
        Returns:
        true if the separator was inserted, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        insertSeparatorIfNeeded(JPopupMenu,int), JMenu.getPopupMenu(), JPopupMenu.Separator

      • getPopupMenuInvokerWrapper

        public static PopupMenuUtils.PopupMenuInvokerWrapper getPopupMenuInvokerWrapper(Component component)
        Returns the component wrapped in a PopupMenuInvokerWrapper.
        Parameters:
        component - the component that will be wrapped.
        Returns:
        a PopupMenuInvokerWrapper wrapping the given component.
        See Also:
        PopupMenuUtils.PopupMenuInvokerWrapper

      • getPopupMenuInvokerWrapper

        public static PopupMenuUtils.PopupMenuInvokerWrapper getPopupMenuInvokerWrapper(MessageContainer<?> messageContainer)
        Returns the messageContainer wrapped in a PopupMenuInvokerWrapper.
        Parameters:
        messageContainer - the message container that will be wrapped.
        Returns:
        a PopupMenuInvokerWrapper wrapping the given messageContainer.
        See Also:
